long_description: Whether you're playing cards or sitting down for dinner, the lightweight, packable REI Camp Roll Table comes in handy on all car-camping adventures. Aluminum legs and heat-resistant aluminum slat top provide a stable, rigid work surface and dining area; aluminum construction saves on weight. Roll top design packs up small, yet provides plenty of space for pots, pans and plates. Packs up into the stuff sack that is included for easy storage and transportation. REI Camp Roll Table has a weight capacity of 100 lbs.
short_description: Whether you're playing cards or sitting down for dinner, the lightweight, packable REI Camp Roll Table comes in handy on all car-camping adventures.
